author: customer
text: I purchased a necklace on March 10, which was supposed to be a birthday gift (birthday has come and gone).  It has now been 18 days that they have had my payment, and yet the package tracking information informs me that a shipping label was printed but that the necklace has not yet left the warehouse.  Ironically, I did see the notification that my purchase is now outside of the window to qualify for returns.  Extremely disappointed.  The only feedback from the company was to reimburse me for shipping and tell me that they are going to request a "rush" on the order.
title: I purchased a necklace on March 10

author: customer
text: I ordered a jacket that was listed as size L, and when it arrived it was an XS. Its beautiful, and I'm very sad it doesn't even come close to fitting. This is my second experience with sloppy customer service at the Real Real, and its very disappointing. I'm told I'll get reimbursed fully (shipping even), but that remains to be seen. Based on my interactions in the past I am not confident.
title: completely wrong sizing

author: customer
text: I am giving this 3 stars because I'm quite disappointed. One of the deciding factors in making my purchase was that it said that the dress was in box. I can say that many people who order designer prefer when things are in box or original dust bag. When my package arrived, I found that my dress was not in box as stated on the website and on my packing slip. On top of that, the dress I ordered was white and wrapped in black tissue paper inside of a poly bag. It would be one thing if the dress was placed inside of dust bag from The Real Real, but it was left to chance that it wouldn't be damaged. For making a purchase that is considered final, I find this unacceptable and quite out of character. I did contact customer service and they were very kind. They refunded my shipping cost in the form of store credit. While this is nice and appreciated, I still wish I had the box. Please double check before sending future orders.
title: I am giving this 3 stars because I'm…

author: G Z
text:
Love the available products, shipping, packaging and general site and app experience.
Really don’t like that garments are shot on only one size mannequin regardless of the garment size. Clothes are awkwardly pinned or draped, which is both offensive and not helpful. I would rather see the garment flat.
title: Great site, bad representation of garments

author: TrapperMD
text: The only thing I don't like about it is, it doesn't show or mention what wear and tear or imperfection the item has.  I would rather see or know what I'm buying first, good or bad so there's no regret.  I would have bought the purse anyway knowing what it needed to get fixed.  I got lucky, it was a small repair.  Now, I don't want to buy anything else anymore because I don't know what I'm getting.
title: You don't see what you really get!

author: customer
text:
Bought an item from TheRealReal
Consigned it 2 days after receiving it.
They RETURNED it to me saying it's not a brand they carry...after I purchased it from them
I had several phone calls...sent it back for consignment and have not heard a single thing from them in several weeks.
I would NEVER send something truly expensive to them.  Lack of customer service, follow up and attention to detail.
Total disaster
title: Disaster

author: customer
text: When I received this bag there was a smell (perfume or incense) that I still haven't been able to get to dissipate. It is very strong and whenever I use the bag I can smell it continuously.  The pictures of the inside lining didn't show this but that there is sticky residue that I am unable to get out. And anything I put into this bag including my wallet sticks to whatever this is.  I've tried cleaning the liner but nothing has seemed to work.  The exterior of the bag was in good shape.  But both the smell and the sticky residue aren't easily remedied and will make me second guess any future purchases I make with The Real Real in the future.  This was a final sale item otherwise I would return.
title: Buyer beware of potential odors on used items.
